content: hanjan crochet s serie h s a st n ar y granny block blanket this blanket really is a classic that anyone can tackle all you need is a bunch of your favourite coloured yarns ­ as many or as few as you like ­ and you re away using a simple repeat this is the perfect beginner project to practise your technique and gauge yarn y a r n c d h k o y ic a e r n ­ a o p f p yo ro u x r h o o k 5mm/h si ze th b e l a fi n n k is e h t ed g a u ge row 16 s s t = 1 a 0 n c d m 9 by measures 70cm 10cm 250g by 76cm hanjan crochet granny block blanket pattern yarn coming soon stitch about 250g of any double knit tutorials wool of your choice visit hanjancrochet com to find out more o ok pattern h foundation chain ch80 or 5mm/h any multiple of 2 size row 1 half_double_crochet in 2nd chain from hook *ch1 skip 1 half_double_crochet repeat from * across the finished blanket measures 70cm by 76cm row 2 rs ch3 counts as st *3tr in each ch1­space gauge across treble_crochet in last st row 3 ch1 does not count 16st and 9 row = half_double_crochet in same *ch1 half_double_crochet 10cm by 10cm between groups of 3tr repeat from * across to last set of key 3tr ch1 half_double_crochet in last st chain = chain row 2 and 3 create the chsp = chain space pattern double_crochet = double_crochet half_double_crochet = half treble row 4-67 repeat the treble_crochet = treble pattern repeat = repeat rs = right side skip = skip to finish either sew in the space = space ends or tie them to create slip_stitch = slip_stitch tassels ws = wrong side pattern copyright ©of hanjan pattern may not be resold
